RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the front seat: front seat of Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the back seat: back seat of Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: location where the pickup truck was stopped, approximately 115 miles north of the United States-Mexican border
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexican border: geographical boundary relevant to determining distance from the border and a key factor in the Brignoni-Ponce test for reasonably warranting suspicion in border patrol stops
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Interstate Highway 35: location where alien smuggling history is relevant and a common route with known alien smuggling activity, where Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle was stopped
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.front seat of Maria De Jesus Garcia's ve: location where three women were observed in the truck cab
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.back seat of Maria De Jesus Garcia's veh: location where five or six men were found attempting to conceal themselves
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.stop on Interstate Highway 35: place where Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle was stopped by border patrol agents, based on recent apprehensions of illegal alien smugglers in the area and suspicious behavior of the occupants
